sentences.en: a good hotel
sentences.cn: 一家不错的宾馆

sentences.en: A good relationship involves concern and sensitivity for each other's feelings.
sentences.cn: 一段美满的恋情需要彼此关心并体恤对方的情感。

sentences.en: Alex is very good at languages.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯在语言方面很擅长。

sentences.en: Butter, margarine, and oily fish are all good sources of vitamin D.
sentences.cn: 黄油、人造黄油和多脂鱼都含有丰富的维生素D。

sentences.en: could the discussion do any good?.
sentences.cn: 这个讨论有用吗？。

sentences.en: Do not wait for good things to happen to you. You need to walk towards happiness.
sentences.cn: 不要等待好事降临，你要向幸福进发。

sentences.en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentences.cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

sentences.en: good quality cloth
sentences.cn: 优质布料

sentences.en: He did well to get such a good mark.
sentences.cn: 他表现不错，得了这么高的分数。

sentences.en: He does deserve some good luck after so much wretchedness.
sentences.cn: 经过这么多苦难之后，他应该行点好运了。

sentences.en: His qualifications aren’t good enough .
sentences.cn: 他的条件不够出色。

sentences.en: His qualifications aren’t good enough.
sentences.cn: 他的条件不够出色。

sentences.en: How are you Lennox? Good to see you up and about.
sentences.cn: 你怎么样，伦诺克斯？很高兴看到你能下床走动了。

sentences.en: I came out £7 to the good.
sentences.cn: 我净得7英镑。

sentences.en: I feel it's done me good to get it off my chest.
sentences.cn: 我感觉吐吐苦水对我有好处。

sentences.en: I have tried to pack a good deal into a few words.
sentences.cn: 我尽量言简意赅。

sentences.en: I left Texas and said good riddance to all that.
sentences.cn: 我离开了得克萨斯州，总算摆脱了那里的一切。

sentences.en: I try to remember all the good times I've had here.
sentences.cn: 我试着回忆在这里度过的所有美好时光。

sentences.en: It'll be good and dark by then.
sentences.cn: 到那时天会非常黑。

sentences.en: My French is better than my Spanish.
sentences.cn: 我的法语比西班牙语好。

sentences.en: Remember, keep a positive attitude and good things will happen.
sentences.cn: 记住：保持乐观的心态，好事自然会发生。

sentences.en: She’s a very good player.
sentences.cn: 她是一名非常优秀的球员。

sentences.en: she's as good as here.
sentences.cn: 她几乎要到这儿了。

sentences.en: She’s such a good baby.
sentences.cn: 她真是个乖宝宝。

sentences.en: Stay away from Jerry – he’s no good.
sentences.cn: 离杰里远点——他不是什么好东西。

sentences.en: tell me whether that picture is any good.
sentences.cn: 告诉我那张照片是否还可以。

sentences.en: the experience almost frightened me away for good.
sentences.cn: 这场经历几乎吓得我不敢再来了。

sentences.en: The ideas in the show's presentation were good, but failed in execution.
sentences.cn: 那场展览陈述的想法很好，但是没能实现。

sentences.en: The kids were as good as gold (= very good ) .
sentences.cn: 孩子们都很乖。

sentences.en: the skirt looked as good as new.
sentences.cn: 这条裙子看起来像新的一样。

sentences.en: The train service is not very good enough.
sentences.cn: 火车服务不是很好。

sentences.en: The train service is not very good.
sentences.cn: 火车服务不是很好。

sentences.en: the walk will do you good.
sentences.cn: 散步有益于你的健康。

sentences.en: This could be the feel-good movie of the autumn.
sentences.cn: 这可以称得上是今秋令人赏心悦目的影片了。

sentences.en: would you be so good as to answer.
sentences.cn: 能否请你回答。

sentences.en: You have to know where to stand for a good viewpoint.
sentences.cn: 你得知道站在哪里观察角度比较理想。

sentences.en: You’ll receive the best medical treatment.
sentences.cn: 你将得到最好的治疗。

words.tran_cn: 漂亮的；优秀的；相当多的
感伤的；伪善的；假正经的
糖果；身份低微之老妇；吸引人的东西；伪君子

phrases.tran_cn: 状况良好的，（损坏后）恢复如新的；康复的，痊愈的
和…几乎一样，实际上等于…
获得一定的净利润或好处

phrases.phrase: be any (或 no 或 much) good
phrases.tran_cn: 有一些（或没有或很多）优点

phrases.phrase: be so good as (或 be good enough) to do something
phrases.tran_cn: ［用来礼貌地表示请求］能否请…

phrases.phrase: come up with (或 deliver) the goods
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)按所期望（或所要求）的去做
对某人（尤指对其健康）有益
(非正式)得到（或掌握）可能对某人不利的信息
(非正式)非常（用于形容词或副词前以加强语气）
有效的；会产生；有支付…能力的
好运；幸运的事情；干的不错
良好品质，高品质；好质量

trans.tran_cn: 好的，令人愉快的，擅长的，有益的，合适的，赞同的，正直的，守规矩的，乖的，好心的，健康的，感叹，赞同，相当大的，不少于，彻底的，有趣的，足以维持的，有效的，能提供…的
trans.tran_en: of a high standard or quality
well. Many teachers think this is not correct English
in order to help someone or improve a situation
